ActorTalk: We'll help Lucia pick out the perfect coatings for her. As for the final look, please check it out with the Gray Raven Commandant.
If I had to pick, I'd recommend the high ponytail first.
It's clean and sharp. Perfectly matches your style. It won't get in the way during combat, and it brings out your confident side. A great mix of practicality and flair.
It does feel sleek and unrestrictive. What do you think, Commandant?
Since you're here to explore new looks, you've got to try a few! Next up is the hair bun.
It's light and lively, adds a playful touch, and gives off an easygoing and approachable vibe. The whole look is full of energy with a hint of charm. Definitely worth a try.
Isn't this style a bit over-the-top for me? What do you think, Commandant?
And finally, we have the sleek and elegant straight hair style.

The hair falls smoothly and naturally, giving off a composed, graceful air. It highlights your calm demeanor while adding a touch of quiet softness. It brings out your personality and works perfectly for everyday wear.
I remember when we first met, my hair was like this... What do you think, Commandant?
We've tried all the recommended styles. Was there one you liked best, Commandant?
Oh, by the way, Commandant, the shop also has lots of coating outfits you can try on...
Really? Then maybe I'll wear it more often.
Well... I'll take that as a yes.
Maybe I'll try a different one.
An unexpected surprise, then?
As long as you like it...
...Let me try a few more.
Really? Thank you...
Commandant...
Maybe it just feels a little different from what I'm used to?
Great, I'll try more styles like that in the future.
It fits your usual look really well.
I like it.
It doesn't quite suit you.
It's a refreshing contrast to your usual vibe.
It looks natural, and it really suits you.
The high ponytail.
The hair bun.
The straight hair.
The twin tails.
I like them all.
We've got plenty of time. Let's try them together.
